description: Try this delicious recipe to liven up those potatoes on the side.
keywords: Vegetable dishes,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Halal,High fibre,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Spicy Pan Fried Potatoes Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 tbs fennel seed powder, coarsely ground

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a large non stick wok/pan to medium heat, add in the oil.
Once the oil is hot enough, add in the potatoes. Keep frying them for about 5 - 7 mins.
Add in the ginger & garlic paste (you may also use finely minced ginger & garlic). Continue frying the potatoes for another 5 -10 mins or until they are golden brown.
Add in the turmeric, salt and chili powder, continue frying them till fully cooked and well coated with the seasoning. You may use paprika if you want it less spicy!
Finally add in the coarsely ground fennel seeds and curry leaves. Combine well and fry for just about 2 - 3 mins.
All done! Enjoy these zesty potatoes as a side to any dish!
